text: @WhiteHouse You failed on coronavirus. “Everyone who needs a test can get a test”...    IS STILL AS FALSE AS THE FIRST TIME YOU SAID IT.   Please resign, you waste of human space. #ImpeachedPresidentTrump #DontDrinkBleach #covfefe19
